headline: RT editor resigns, cites 'nuclear war' over Ukraine invasion; Dems projected to face bloodbath in midterms
author: Jack Durschlag
sentences:
Here's what you need to know to start your day ...
NUCLEAR OPTION - Maria Baronova resigned as editor-in-chief of Russia Today, a state-run media operation also known as RT, last week after condemning Russian President Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine.

"- SEAN HANNITY
